about_the_game:
Welcome to Restaurant Owner! Where your adventure with the world of culinary enterprise awaits! In this management simulator, you take on the challenge of running your own restaurant.

Key Features

  • Menu design

  • Restaurant management

  • Staff management

  • Sales system

  • Finances

  • Decor customization

  • Living environment

Put your business skills to the test! Take your first steps as an owner of a humble diner and work your way to the top as the crème de la crème of restaurant tycoons!

Management

Serve your customers, organize your storage space, order ingredients, furnish your eatery. There are plenty of tasks awaiting an aspiring restaurant owner and it’s your job to make sure they’re done, and everything’s kept running smoothly.

Gastronomy

Your starting capital allows for a small fast-food place at first. Compose your first diner menu snacks and progress towards fancier food in no time! You choose the dishes served at your restaurant. Can you find the best cuisine?

Finances

From collecting tips to managing a team of world-class staff. As you progress, you’ll have opportunities to control your finances and automate ingredient purchasing, and design a work schedule for your staff. Make sure the bills are paid, and your restaurant makes a tidy profit.

Success

Once you get a taste of success, you’ll be hooked for good! Expand your venue, hire more employees, and get fancier equipment. Watch as the world outside your restaurant’s doors responds to its success by actually getting a bigger crowd queuing for a table at your place.

Dive into the challenge of culinary enterprise with a Restaurant Owner!

Minimum:

  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Restaurant Owner is a simulator that gives you the opportunity to manage an eatery of your own. Compose your menu, decorate your venue, and hire your staff. All in an effort to achieve financial success in the fine dining business!
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
